title: New Milford program offers small biz health insurance info
title_page: New Milford program offers small biz health insurance info
maintext:
A program addressing the health insurance for small businesses will be held from 6 to 7:30 p.m. Tuesday at the Makery Coworking Space in New Milford.
Lynne Ide, director of program and policy at the Universal Health Care Foundation, will present at the wine, cheese and conversation event. She will discuss a bill before the state legislature that would allow the state to leverage its negotiation power to provide dependable, quality health plans designed for small businesses.
Small businesses employ more than 700,000 people in Connecticut, and yet less than half can afford to offer health insurance to their employees, according to the press release.
For more information and to RSVP for this event, please contact Ann Pratt at ann.prattccag@gmail.com, 860-209-1234.
